body.name: 2K Dash Cam WiFi, Front and Rear Dash Camera for Cars Night Vision WDR Dashcam with 3 Inches, 170° Wide Angle, GPS Included, HD Screen Loop Recording, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor,with Free 32GB Card
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 10 mins
features: 【2K HD Dash Cams】: The 2k dash camera can record videos up to a resolution of 1296p and helps you read the details like road signs, vehicle number plates, etc. dashcam features front and rear DUAL cameras, with each capturing views at 170° and 140° ultra-wide angle respectively to reduce blind area, and essential evidence can be retained and presented in the event of a collision. This dash camera supports micro SD cards up to 128GB (32GB memory card included, no separate purchase required).

【Built-In WIFI & APP Control】：The dashboard camera can connect to your smartphone APP via connecting WIFI. You can use the - 6zhentan - app to view real-time videos on your iPhone or Android device while on the drive. Furthermore, you can download your recorded 2k videos directly to your smartphone and then easily share these on social media with friends and family. 【🔧Please scan the QR code on the manual to download the app. If you cannot scan, please contact customer service.】

【Dashcam With GPS】: This driving recorder dansh cam has built-in GPS, connects to the GPS module, and you can record the driving route, real-time speed, location, etc. Using the App or with our Windows and Mac GPSPlayer, which will provide further additional evidence if an accident occurs. 【🔧Please make sure to install the GPS module before use.】

【Superior Night Vision & Headlight Reminder】： This dashcam incorporates an F2.0 larger aperture, advanced WDR tech, and a Starvis sensor, which make it easy to handle any difficult lighting conditions. When driving at night or passing through tunnels, when the light is insufficient, the recorder will automatically prompt you to turn on the headlights， which is a good helper for your night driving！

【New Function Upgrade】：This dash camera for cars not only has functions such as 24 hours parking mode, motion detection, 170° A+ wide-angle lens, G-Sensor, loop recording, emergency video lock, time-lapse video, etc. But also adds headlight reminder, reversing assist, automatic microphone recording, power off screen recording, etc. Powerful functions protect your driving safety.

【Easy To Set Up 】: The installation and operation are simple, and even first-time users need no worry. Easy-to-use 3M sticker stand, with the included electrostatic sticker, you can stick it anywhere you want without leaving any smudges. 【🔧Note: In order to avoid scratches on the screen during transportation, there is a protective film on the screen of the recorder, please tear it off before use.】
body.description: Why Choose Ajvvf 2K car dash camera? 2 Channel Recording: This front and rear dash camera 2-way dash cameras with 170°+140°Viewing Angle reduce blind area, providing you a wider field of vision effectively.WiFi: Easily access videos with App (IOS/Android available), provides a convenient way to view, download, and share the footage.GPS: GPS will track the vehicle’s driving route, speed, and other information about every journey.Larger Memory Capacity: Easy to output footage-Support up to 128G SD card(32G SD card included). Appearance Size: 87*50*15mm/3.4*1.9*0.5 In Weight: 500g/ 1.1lb Shooting Angle: 170°+140° Data Storage Capacity: Maximum Support 128G Data Transmission Interface: USB, HDMI, USB/HDMI Power Supply: 5V1A Screen Size: 3 Inches Lens: F2.0

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2K Dash CamRear Camera + CableUSB Car ChargerGPS Module + Installation LineModule Connection Cable3M Sticky Mount +Spare 3M stickersEnglish & Chinese User ManualElectrostatic Films32GB TF Card Why Choose Ajvvf 2K car dash camera? 2 Channel Recording: This front and rear dash camera 2-way dash cameras with 170°+140°Viewing Angle reduce blind area, providing you a wider field of vision effectively.WiFi: Easily access videos with App (IOS/Android available), provides a convenient way to view, download, and share the footage.GPS: GPS will track the vehicle’s driving route, speed, and other information about every journey.Larger Memory Capacity: Easy to output footage-Support up to 128G SD card(32G SD card included). Appearance Size: 87*50*15mm/3.4*1.9*0.5 In Weight: 500g/ 1.1lb Shooting Angle: 170°+140° Data Storage Capacity: Maximum Support 128G Data Transmission Interface: USB, HDMI, USB/HDMI Power Supply: 5V1A Screen Size: 3 Inches Lens: F2.0

24H Parking Monitor & Time-lapse With the G-sensor Parking mode, the driving recorder will automatically record a short video and lock it when it detects a sudden bump or impact. The front-facing dash cam pro also supports 24 hours parking monitor with time-lapse mode providing your car with 24-hour protection. After the time-lapse video is turned on, it uses one frame and one-second recording to save memory space, preserve video integrity, and record continuously for 24 hours. (The dedicated hardwire kit is needed for this function. Need to buy separately.) G-sensor & Emergency Lock The dash cam hd pro with a built-in adjustable G-Sensor will automatically record and lock videos when it detects a sudden collision during driving and parking. preventing it from being overwritten, which ensures important footage is kept secure. WDR Technology & Screen Protectors The WDR technology used in this dash cam front and rear enables exceptionally bright and very dark scenes while being very clearly seen. Equipped with a high-sensitivity auto-off backlight function, it can record video normally even when the screen is off, saving power while avoiding the impact of reflections on the driver.

Headlight Reminder & Recording When driving at night or passing through tunnels, when the light is insufficient, the recorder will automatically prompt you to turn on the headlights， which is a good helper for your night driving！ Built-in 10M omnidirectional sound-absorbing and noise-canceling microphone, which performs well even in noisy environments. Super Night Vision The car video camera dash cam front and rear can capture clearer videos and photos even in low-light night conditions. The wide-angle lens and high-sensitivity image sensor ensure better image quality when driving at night. 170°+140°Viewing Angle This dash camera front and back 2-way dash cameras with 170°+140°Viewing Angle reduce blind area, providing you a wider field of vision effectively.

Loop Recording Loop recording automatically overwrites the oldest videos and saves current videos to avoid memory cards getting full. Automatically delete irrelevant records, save important information, and extend memory card space. (32GB memory card is in the package, no need to buy it separately). Extreme Temperature Resistance This dual dash cam front and rear can withstand extreme temperatures of -4°F to 158°F to prevent the risk of overheating, explosion, and melting, and its service life is twice that of lithium-ion batteries. Simple Installation Small, compact User-friendly design makes installation and operation easier. This car dash camera front and rear are friendly to a new user and convenient to install the rear camera, connect the car charger power cable to the camera and route the cable alongside the car interior trim panels. Find the best location to equip the dash camera on the front window.

NOTE: Please tear off the protective film on the screen before use.The product comes with an electrostatic sticker. Using the electrostatic sticker, the car dash camera can be installed in any location you install it without leaving any traces.The manual is in both Chinese and English, with one side in English and the other in Chinese. HOW TO USE ELECTROSTATIC FILM? Stick the electrostatic sticker on the appropriate position of the front windshieldTear off the protective film on the 3M adhesive stand on the standAttach the bracket to the electrostatic stickerUsing electrostatic stickers, you can install the recorder anywhere you install it without leaving any traces. HOW TO CONNECT TO WIFI? Select WiFi control on the menu page. After enabling WiFi, scan the QR code on the screen or search for "6zhentan" in the app store to download the app.Select connect to WiFi and enter the password on the phone settings page. After the connection is successful, you can manage it in the APP. The WiFi SSID can be seen on the screen.WiFi Password: 12345678

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash cam
reviews.reviewText: The camera was easy to install and has very clear pictures. This product came with a main front camera and a smaller rear camera. The front camera is suction mounted to the windshield and is on a rotating piece that makes it easy to adjust. Also even though the camera itself can be moved in many ways, once it is set it does not move until you move it. Unfortunately the rear camera that comes with this set does not attach like the front and in fact the rear camera has small screws to mount it with and while this is not a bad thing, this type of setup does not work too well with a pick up truck (specifically flat rear windows). Another thing is that this type of setup does not work for those who do not wish to potentially damage their interior trying to mount this camera properly. The rear camera aside the main camera works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don't let price fool you. This is a great camera and easy to use. Picture and playback are wonderful. The only negative thing I have to say is the cord length could be a lot longer. But I already had a hardwire version installed from previous camera that went bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful product, was a gift to my sister, no problems setting it up with minors adjustments. Quality of picture clear, night time vision clear enough and could improve but it’s worth the buy. Back up camera is a plus addition. Only took one adjustment and the length of wire is good enough. Just have to keep up with SD card in and output of media to keep reusing card. The app setup was a process but has been running smoothly. My sister loves the product and was great watching her setup and raving about it on text about what and how it’s been going and it has been only good things. So happy it was great choice!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Camera with good quality video
reviews.reviewText: This camera records clear video. It’s easy to install and setup. It’s compact and records good video at night. The backup camera is an awesome addition since my car doesn’t have this feature. I like that the SD card is included. It’s worth the price and gives me peace of mind. I’m very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty damn good.
reviews.reviewText: Camera quality is good, in fact everything is pretty good, especially for what you pay. You will need to buy your own double sided tape because the one recieved with the cam didn't work at all, but that's really nothing. Instructions aren't the clearest, but its easy to figure out. I definitely recommend this because it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This camera was SO easy to install (with help from the video in ads description)! I put it in my Prius and was able to attach the back camera to my interior hatch. Almost all cables (95%) are completely tucked away! I would highly recommend. Where I live people run red lights at almost EVERY lite and I know it's just a matter of time before I get hit. When it happens I'll be able to prove their negligence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not record rear view - as best as I can tell
reviews.reviewText: 1st - as far as I can tell, this is not a front and rear view recording camera. It appears to record only front views, but acts as only a back-up camera for the rear view and does not record the rear view and actually I think continuously shows the rear view - with no interlock to power from the reverse lights (the instructions sure don’t help here). So… if you are impacted from the rear, the incident will not be recorded by the camera.2. The instructions are microscopic. At least the manufacturer could do is to give you instructions you can read without a magnifying glass. The height of the printed letters here are about 1/32 of an inch.3. Not only are the instructions microscopic, but they are an absolutely awful translation from Chinese into English. - worse even than there typical awful translations found in Chinese products.4. Here’s what the instructions have to say about installation of the rear view camera:“There are two installation methods: 1. The rear-view mirror (I think this should read “rear-view camera”) is installed above the inner of the rear view windshield… (accompanied by a picture of where to in still it) . 2. The rear-view mirror is installed above the rear of the car to take pictures” (with exactly the same picture as in method 1). Not particularly helpful.What I think these instructions say is that the camera may be mounted above the rear window on the interior of the car, or above the rear window on the exterior the car .5. It would be helpful if there an explanation of exactly what the rear view camera does. Is it just a backup camera with no recordation - or does it record a rear view from the rear of the car?6. This helpful message is included in the instructions:” The mount is adhesive and may be destroyed if it is removed from the windshield”The mount is not adhesive - it is a rubber suction cup - which will not destroy anything if it is removed. The rear camera is apparently installed with screws through a metal bracket on the camera.This camera is going back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Received this as a Christmas gift. Pretty easy to set up and use so far. But I did notice after about 2 weeks that the outside coating around the wire broke where the wire meets the part that plugs into the car. After a few more days the coating around the actual wire had split and I was able to see bare wiring. I went ahead and stopped using until I got a sturdier cord.
